content: X-BT-MR Stainless steel threaded studs Threaded stud for fastenings on coated steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features No rework necessary on coated steel – corrosion protection remains intact Versatile – suitable for use on most standard and high-strength construction steel Secure – creates a true weld to the base material for an extremely strong hold and high loading capacity Portable, cordless system – eliminates the need for long electric supply cords Fast – ideal for fastening directly to coated or treated steel Applications Fastening cable trays, cable ladders, channels, struts, light-duty electrical installation (T-bars, instrumentation panels, junction boxes), fitting out and much more Fastenings to fire coated (PFP) beams Fastening pipe supports to steel, cable tray supports to steel Fastening handrails to steel Fastening façade brackets to steel For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 5/16 in Corrosion protection: Equivalent to A4 (316) stainless steel Environmental Conditions: Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution Technical Data | Base materials | Steel, Stainless steel, Cast iron | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 5/16 in | Corrosion protection | Equivalent to A4 (316) stainless steel | Environmental Conditions | Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution | Material | Duplex stainless steel (1.4462) | Point type | Blunt tip | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2252470 - Threaded stud X-BT-MR W6/10 SN 8 - Package Size 100 pc - 2194340 - Threaded stud X-BT-MR M10/15 SN 8 - Package Size 100 pc - 2194341 - Threaded stud X-BT-MR W10/15 SN 8 - Package Size 100 pc - 3608911 - X-BT MR W6 Install - (500) Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Torque tool X-BT 1/4 20Nm / 14.8lbft - 500x Threaded stud X-BT-MR W6/10 SN 8 - 1x Socket wrench insert X-NSD 1/4 - 7/16 - 500x DX cartridge 6.8/11 M10 STD brown - 3608910 - X-BT MR W10 Install - (500) Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Torque tool X-BT 1/4 20Nm / 14.8lbft - 500x Threaded stud X-BT-MR W10/15 SN 8 - 1x Nut setter S-NS 9/16 C 95/3 3/4 - 500x DX cartridge 6.8/11 M10 STD brown - 3609213 - X-BT MR W16 Install (1K) Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Torque tool X-BT 1/4 20Nm / 14.8lbft - 1000x Threaded stud X-BT-MR W6/10 SN 8 - 1x Socket wrench insert X-NSD 1/4 - 7/16 - 1000x DX cartridge 6.8/11 M10 STD brown - 3608912 - X-BT MR W10 Install (1K) Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Torque tool X-BT 1/4 20Nm / 14.8lbft - 1000x Threaded stud X-BT-MR W10/15 SN 8 - 1x Nut setter S-NS 9/16 C 95/3 3/4 - 1000x DX cartridge 6.8/11 M10 STD brown
